text: Usne apni paida ki hui bahut si cheezon se tumhare liye saaye ka intezam kiya, pahadon mein tumhare liye panaah-gaahein (places of refuge) banayi, aur tumhein aisi poshakein (garments) bakshi jo tumhein garmi se bachati hain aur kuch dusri poshakein jo aapas ki jung mein tumhari hifazat karti hain, is tarah woh tumpar apni niyamaton ki takmeel karta hai shayad ke tum farmabardar bano
